choices: You escape by getting Chloe's attention
1223.content:
Shit! This is the last place you wanted to be. The beautiful Chloe eats a hamburger at her desk while doing something on her laptop. You are trapped in it. Her next bite engulfs you and you are shoved into her mouth. The teen girl chews up her mouthful, but luckily the other stuff around you cushions the blows so you are left in one piece.

*Gulp* Chloe swallows, sending you to the hungry stomach of a tall skinny girl.

Her belly gurgles when you enter. You are immediately dropped into a rancid pool of unrecognizable foodstuff mush and acids.
1223.title: in her food

12231.content:
Chloe's stomach churns you and her lunch into a thick soup. The last thing you experience is the many rumbles and sounds of this teenager's belly, as you are covered with food entering her stomach and already-digested mush flowing over you.

Chloe licks her fingers and pats her stomach. With the other hand, she holds a soda and drinks it. As she stands up to throw out her garbage, Chloe burps loudly. Giggling, she chugs the rest of her soda and successfully out-belches herself with a louder and deeper burp. With a content sigh, she returns to her computer.
12231.title: You're digested
